name: Dead Space (itch)
description:
Dead Space is a top-down space shooter in which you have to play as a spaceship. You have just returned from the war and you were the only one alive. Your task is to take revenge for the loss of your fellow spaceships.

Controls
WASD keys to move
LMB to shoot

Known Bugs
The powerups sometimes trigger more than once
Enemies don't die if you shoot them when they are not chasing you
